glossdef.p: The whole or the only part of a building that has a rise in storeys of not more than 2â€”

ol.li: in which cultural activities including live music, visual arts displays, dancing, poetry and spoken word performances are provided to the public; and
the floor area used as a small arts venue does not exceed 300 m2; and
no pyrotechnics or theatrical smoke (smoke machines, hazers or the like) are used.
